welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Upper Southampton, the charming city known for its rich history and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Philadelphia Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at North Philadelphia Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers including dining options, restrooms, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: The private jet terminal at Doylestown Airport provides VIP services for private jet travelers including a lounge area and concierge services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport, serving all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Alaska Airlines, JetBlue, and Southwest.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Air Canada, British Airways, and Lufthansa.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as American Airlines, British Airways, and Qatar Airways.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and Frontier.

terminals.name: Terminal F
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as American Airlines, Spirit, and United.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upper Bucks Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Upper Bucks Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
